public static class TestClassExtensions
{
    private static ITestClass? instance;

    private static ReadOnlySpan<byte> HotReloadHash => "560ed23693afcebf55a9040a30c87df4"u8;

    public static ITestClass TestClass(this IPythonEnvironment env)
    {
        if (instance is null)
        {
            instance = new TestClassInternal(env.Logger);
        }
        Debug.Assert(!env.IsDisposed());
        return instance;
    }

    public static void UpdateApplication(Type[]? updatedTypes)
    {
        instance?.ReloadModule();
    }

    private class TestClassInternal : ITestClass
    {
        private PyObject module;
        private readonly ILogger<IPythonEnvironment>? logger;

        private PyObject __func_foo_bar_baz;
        private PyObject __func_foo_bar_baz_list;
        private PyObject __func_foo_bar_baz_dict;

        internal TestClassInternal(ILogger<IPythonEnvironment>? logger)
        {
            this.logger = logger;
            using (GIL.Acquire())
            {
                logger?.LogDebug("Importing module {ModuleName}", "test");
                this.module = ThisModule.Import();
                this.__func_foo_bar_baz = module.GetAttr("foo_bar_baz");
                this.__func_foo_bar_baz_list = module.GetAttr("foo_bar_baz_list");
                this.__func_foo_bar_baz_dict = module.GetAttr("foo_bar_baz_dict");
            }
        }

        void IReloadableModuleImport.ReloadModule()
        {
            logger?.LogDebug("Reloading module {ModuleName}", "test");
            using (GIL.Acquire())
            {
                Import.ReloadModule(ref module);
                // Dispose old functions
                this.__func_foo_bar_baz.Dispose();
                this.__func_foo_bar_baz_list.Dispose();
                this.__func_foo_bar_baz_dict.Dispose();
                // Bind to new functions
                this.__func_foo_bar_baz = module.GetAttr("foo_bar_baz");
                this.__func_foo_bar_baz_list = module.GetAttr("foo_bar_baz_list");
                this.__func_foo_bar_baz_dict = module.GetAttr("foo_bar_baz_dict");
            }
        }

        public void Dispose()
        {
            logger?.LogDebug("Disposing module {ModuleName}", "test");
            this.__func_foo_bar_baz.Dispose();
            this.__func_foo_bar_baz_list.Dispose();
            this.__func_foo_bar_baz_dict.Dispose();
            module.Dispose();
        }

        public Integration.Tests.RichReturnTests.FooBarBaz FooBarBaz()
        {
            using (GIL.Acquire())
            {
                this.logger?.LogDebug("Invoking Python function: {FunctionName}", "foo_bar_baz");
                PyObject __underlyingPythonFunc = this.__func_foo_bar_baz;
                using PyObject __result_pyObject = __underlyingPythonFunc.Call();

                return __return;
            }
        }

                this.logger?.LogDebug("Invoking Python function: {FunctionName}", "foo_bar_baz_list");

        {
            using (GIL.Acquire())

                this.logger?.LogDebug("Invoking Python function: {FunctionName}", "foo_bar_baz_dict");
